interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: AG Care Natural Remedy Apple Cider Vinegar Leave On Mist Review Date: 2019/02/12 Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AG Care', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Material Feature': 'Plant Based, Vegan', 'Hair Type': 'All, Color Treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Gently cleanses and seals cuticle to enhance shine. Superfoods and apple cider vinegar support soft, healthy hair.Gently cleanses and seals cuticle to enhance shine. Superfoods and apple cider vinegar support soft, healthy hair. See more', 'Product Dimensions': '1.75 x 1.75 x 6 inches; 6.14 Ounces', 'Item model number': '100150', 'UPC': '625336002391', 'Manufacturer': 'AG Hair', 'Country of Origin': 'Canada'} Review Text: I can't use this. It dried my very fine color treated out to make it look like red straw. My daughter who doesn't wash her hair every day loves it. Her hair is very thick and wavy and blonde. Softened her hair and...I am not joking...made it shine in the sun. She uses on the days when she doesn't wash (every three days). This keeps the buildup at bay.

My postal gal is pretty good about delivering packages but even with her careful handling, the plastic top was broken. No leaks. Review Title: AG Hair Natural Remedy Apple Cider Leave On Mist Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Leave In Conditioner with Almond Milk, Aloe Butter and Shea Oil for Extremely Damaged Hair, 8 fl oz Carol's Daughter ['Reverses Damage'] {'Brand': "Carol's Daughter", 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Damaged, Coily', 'Product Benefits': 'Repairs Damage, Strengthens and Protects Hair, Restores Softness for Over-Processed Hair', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 1.97 x 7.49 inches; 9.88 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'K4268600', 'UPC': '820645235120 755332169061', 'Manufacturer': "Carol's Daughter"} My daughter has very, very thick wavy blonde hair. Not colored or processed. We've been using another conditioner in a primarily African American line but she didn't like the smell (coconut). This one has won her over completely. After she gets out of the shower, she puts a dime size dab in hand and coats her hands and then start at the ends works her way to the roots.

There is no residue and it washes out completely the next time so there are no flaky specs. Carols Daughter Almond Milk Restoring Conditioner Green Goo Natural Skin Care for Eczema, Psoriasis, Cracked Hands and Feet, Black, Dry Skin, 1.82 Ounce Green Goo {'Brand': 'Green Goo', 'Scent': 'Dry Skin', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': '*Achillea Millefolium (Yarrow) Flower Extract, *Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Flower Oil, *Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower, *Sambucus Nigra (Elder) Flower, *Trifolium Pratense (Red Clover) Flower., Vitamin_e*Achillea Millefolium (Yarrow) Flower Extract, *Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Flower Oil, *Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower, *Sambucus Nigra (Elder) Flower, *Trif… See more', 'Unit Count': '1.82 Ounce', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 0.5 inches; 1.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'GOO-05690', 'Department': 'Unisex-adult', 'Date First Available': 'April 22, 2016', 'Manufacturer': 'Green Goo'} I got this because of a persistent dry spot on my neck and ear for over a year . The doctor said it was eczema and prescribed an ointment. Didn't help. I must have tried everything over the counter in the beauty aisle and health. Tried this as a last resort and bam! Within two days of four times a day, the dry spots were gone. Thanks!! Green Goo Dry Skin Large Tin Jade Roller for Face,Anti-aging Jade Roller Massager Eye Jade Facial Roller for Women Puffiness, Real Jade 100% Natural Herbivore Jade Facial Roller Jade Stone Roller Set with Gua Sha Tool,Case,Pouch OYOROL {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 2.2 x 0.59 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '799392612136'} I never thought I would like these. I mean, come on a roller for your face? But I admit I was wrong. The first few times were pleasant. I used them to spread my face oil around but I read that it's much better if it's cool. I put it in the fridge for an hour and OMG! Total turnaround. The bags under my eyes shrunk a bit but it feels so much better. I don't see the cosmetic changes but the coolness against my face after a long day at work. Two thumbs up. It dried my very fine color treated out to make it look like red straw. My daughter who doesn't wash her hair every day loves it. Her hair is very thick and wavy and blonde. Softened her hair and...I am not joking...made it shine in the sun. She uses on the days when she doesn't wash (every three days). This keeps the buildup at bay.

My postal gal is pretty good about delivering packages but even with her careful handling, the plastic top was broken. No leaks. AG Hair Natural Remedy Apple Cider Leave On Mist
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Preference:** Focuses on products for extremely damaged, curly, and coily hair types, with a specific consideration for her daughter’s thick, wavy hair needs.
- **Ingredients Sensitivity:** Prefers natural, plant-based ingredients across beauty categories, valuing efficacy, especially for repair and restoration in hair and skincare.
- **Usage Habits:** Mindfully applies products from ends to roots, demonstrating a thoughtful regimen. The recent experience indicates a willingness to explore products that may not fully meet her needs, reflecting adaptability in her approach.
- **Scent Sensitivity:** Dislikes strong scents, specifically coconut, and favors subtle or pleasant aromas to enhance the user experience.
- **Family-Centric:** Prioritizes family-centric solutions, noting that her daughter benefits more from certain products, showcasing a nurturing approach to purchases.
- **Efficacy Valuation:** Values effective hair care products that leave no residue and are easy to wash out, emphasizing cleanliness and health in her routines.
- **High Ratings Preference:** Usually inclined towards products with high ratings, but recent experiences indicate a pragmatic choice based on family needs rather than solely on ratings.
- **Skeptical to Open-Minded:** Shows an open-mindedness towards new products, including those outside her typical choices, to accommodate her family’s specific hair care needs while continuing to seek products with beneficial properties.

Overall, the user remains committed to effective, family-friendly solutions with a preference for natural ingredients, pleasant aromas, and an openness to experimenting with diverse hair care options.
